subject: Testing J2EEDelegate
msgSnippet: Hi, ... import com.smartprice.j2ee.*; import com.smartprice.webservice.transfer.*; import com.smartprice.transfer.*; import com.smartprice.*; import
messageBody:
Hi,
I have the class test:

--------
import com.smartprice.j2ee.*;
import com.smartprice.webservice.transfer.*;
import com.smartprice.transfer.*;
import com.smartprice.*;
import java.util.*;

import junit.framework.*;


public class TestJ2EEDelegate extends TestCase
{
private J2EEDelegateService service;
private J2EEDelegate port;

public TestJ2EEDelegate(String name)
{
super(name);
}

public static Test suite()
{
return new TestSuite(TestJ2EEDelegate.class);
}

public static void main(String args[]) {
junit.textui.TestRunner.run(suite());
}

public void setUp() throws Exception{
service = new J2EEDelegateServiceLocator();
port = service.getJ2EE();
}

public void testInsertUser() throws Exception
{
UserTransfer userCriado = new UserTransfer();
userCriado.setName("Fernando");
userCriado.setEmail("fernando@...");
UserPK uPK = port.insertUser(userCriado);
UserTransfer userRecuperado = port.getUser(uPK);
assertEquals(userCriado,userRecuperado);

}
}
--------

The textual test runner is working fine, but when I run the graphical
test runner this error occurs:

---------
java.lang.NullPointerException
at org.apache.axis.client.Service.getEngineConfiguration(Service.java:801)
at org.apache.axis.client.Service.getAxisClient(Service.java:143)
at org.apache.axis.client.Service.<init>(Service.java:152)
at com.smartprice.j2ee.J2EEDelegateServiceLocator.<init>(Unknown
Source)
at TestJ2EEDelegate.setUp(Unknown Source)
----------

What's wrong?
